import React,{useState} from 'react' import classes from './CourseViewDashboard.module.css'; import {BsFillCheckSquareFill} from 'react-icons/bs'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {BsFillTrashFill, BsPeopleFill} from 'react-icons/bs'; import {BiEdit} from 'react-icons/bi'; const CourseViewDashboard = (props)=>{ let history = useHistory(); const [style,setStyle]=useState(props.Course); const [enrollStatus, showEnrollStatus]= useState(false); const moveToSubject=()=>{ history.push('/dashboard/subject'); } const enrollInfoButtonHandler =()=>{ showEnrollStatus(true); } return (
SUBJECT: {props.Course.subject}
CODE: {props.Course.courseLocalCode} ({props.Course.courseGlobalCode})
DESIGNED FOR: {props.Course.designedFor}
{/* 37 */} {/**/}
INSTRUCTOR: Prof. Seema Bahinipati
{/*enrollment status div starts*/} { enrollStatus &&
New enrollment request from Mr. Depak Samal
New enrollment request from Mr. Depak Samal
} {/*enrollment status div ends*/}
UPCOMING CLASS: 9:45 am | 27/02/2022
STATUS: Ongoing
View Detail
); } export default CourseViewDashboard;
